pkgmetadata.longdescription: Query the 'PurpleAir' Application Programming Interface // Send requests to the 'PurpleAir' Application Programming Interface (API; https://community.purpleair.com/c/data/api/18). Check a 'PurpleAir' API key and get information about the related organization. Download real-time data from a single 'PurpleAir' sensor or many sensors by sensor identifier, geographical bounding box, or time since modified. Download historical data from a single sensor.
